text: (kiyawanna juwam 4/1-40)
mechcharayi kiyanna thiyenne post eka kiyawanne nathuwa magen
olimpik tharaga atharathura
sachilage para lagin habala payin yaddi nam tharamak wassath man kap eka dagena themigenama giya.

warsha 1858 di yatath wijitha lekamwarayata lipiyak yawana dayik dakunu indiya kamkaruwan kandukarayata yawima sandaha thanu para depasa mannarama ha wannipaththuwala janaya wadi washayen miya yamin sitina aakarayath, nuwara kalawiya thula wasarak pasa me bihisunu wasangathaya pathirena aakarayath me maranawalin siduwana wishala jana haniyath gana liwweya.

mewan wu parisarayaka siti minisunge menma wana sathuntada akarunika iranamakata goduru wi atha.
mata jiwathwenna oona nisa kiyanne naha.
mata wiruddhawa ewana lada sama shapayakatama mama shapa karami.
anatharjathika awadhanayata lak wu keti chithrapata nirmana karuwaku wana aruna lokuliyana eeshwara winshathiya teli natyaye adhyakshawarayaya.

eeth hari giye na.

maraya ohuta aramunu no labayi.
"me gana mathiwarana komasaris ekka katha kala. 1977 parana nama lekhanayata anuwama me mathiwaranaya thiyamu.
emenma ema aayathana dekehi thanpathukaruwange saha…
"welawakata hithenawa ban akke daiwaya apiwa thoragaththe mekatamada kiyala.
mama iwathata giyemi.
ane duhup kiwwe!
rawaya sanwathsarayedi oba ki dushitha walalla gana thawath wisthara karanna puluwanda?

uddhamanaya ihala gos arbuda rasakata muhuna di thibiyadi melesa wadup wadi kirimata nikolos madhuro thiranaya kara thibima wisheshathwayaki.
ese nam ee kohe da?
onna aluth wadeta issella ma kament eka damme mama..
gahe pahala ma thibuna aththak mage oluwa himita athagawa.
liyanna kammaliyi ban.
hari giya sathiye kotasa tikak mathak karagammu.
ayi metharam lassana yapawo iddith mama wage wayasaka kenek mekata ganne” wage dewal.
yana mayen wu lipiya pilibanda apurwa wisin dakwana lada adahas samaga sanwadayak godananga ganima mema lipiye aramunayi.
habayi eyin kiyawenne na..
ohu eeta pera kolambaa brithanya maha komasaris karyalaye bhasha pariwarthaka wiya.
dan hodatama karuwalath watilane..”
sahithyaka yatharthawadaya pahalawennema uththara aithihasika thaththwaya thulin aathwenna.

ehema eka nimiththakama sitha adagena sitina thanaththage chiththa santhathiya (sithuwili paramparawa) karma balayen ema aramunu wu karmayata anurupa wana paridi yam kisi sthanayaka prathisandhi sitha athiwimen wenath bhawayaka upatha labanawa.
widhayakaya ahosiyata - mathiwarana kramaya kondesiyak nowe.

karunarathna ha sayiman nawagaththegama ayath wu ‘es thune’ kandayama yanadiya mita drushtantha we.
ejapaya suluthara aanduwak weyi..

rambaakanoya jalashayata ayath bhumi pradeshaye pihiti gas kapa iwath kirime siddhiya gana sewimata parikshana kamituwak path kara thibe.parisara amathya anura priyadarshana yapa mahatha wisin mema kamituwa pathkara athi bawa parisara amathyanshaya pawasayi.ema siddhiyata adalawa yam akramikathawak siduwa athayi thahawuru wuwahoth niladharinge tharathirama nobala owunta wiruddhawa dadi kriyamarga ganimata pasubata nowana bawa amathyawaraya awadharanaya karayi.
[[pituwe nama_penwiya yuthu wadana]]
mata nam eeka echcharatama alluwe na.
ethakota pahadili yamak nopeni hitha his wenawa.
basaya ada yayi laba thatu.....

anawasarayen langa thaba gena siti pimbaurek ha ibban 6 k samaga kanthawak athadanguwata madakalapuwa samuha - jawufar kan kaththankudi polis wasamata ayath hoddimuneyi pradeshaye nithi wirodhiwa athi karana lada adi 10 k digathi pimbaurek, ibban hayak samagin kanthawak kaththankudi polisiya wisin athadanguwata ganna ladi.

rate nayakaya gamata yama waradakda?game chandaya dinawanawata wada rate nayakayakuta karanna wada rashiyak thiyenawa.rate sanwardhanaya wenuwen jathyantharaya samanga kerena katayuthu rashiyakata rate nayakathwaya madihath wiya yuthuyi.
api hamoma jiwithe amu moda wada karala thiyenawa.mita kalinuth hathara pas polaka kiyala thiyenawa wage minissunwa kalu ...
eeka asadharana bawa api parlimenthuwedi kiwwa.
mema charikawedi anawaranaya wu wishesha karuna wanne widula sopanayak nomathi mema rohale ee sandaha pathkarana lada sopana kriyakarawannan dedenaku sitimaya.
pandu yawimedi michel stak kadulu 2k binda heliya.bangalor-70 (oowara 15) wirat koli 21 (prawin thambe 20/4)rajasthan-71/4 (oowara 13) shen wotsan 24, ajinkya rahane 23.

mama ee ayage hakiyawan palamu warata dakinne mita tika dinakata pera nelum pokuna elimahan bhumiye pawathi ayidiyal wishan oto and layif stayil sho 2017 yathurupadi sandarshanaya atharathuradi mama dakka deyak thamayi me kridawa thulin jathyantharayata yanna puluwan hakiyawan sahitha tharuna pirisak apa rate innawa kiyana deya.

kese ho siddiya samathayakata path kala apa polis niladharinwath pitath kota yawa samantath yannata pawasa handawe apa langama hithawathun wenuwen pawathwannata sudanam kala patiya wetha hitha yomu kalemu.
wipakshayath baninne mudal amathyanshayata.
dawasa gane hal lipe thiyanawa wage kashaya tika thambanna oona.
pahuwada eekath aran widuhalpathithuma lagata giyama ‘‘ waradimakin unath oya lamayata labila thiyenne hari baj eka..

poson pohoya dinaye hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha thangalla kaltan niwese pawathi wishesha dharma deshanayata sahabhagi wiya.
ithin eeka nisa thama ehema wune.
patta pal boru ban oowa, kalu sinhalaya umbaa eeka aththa kiyala oppu karapanko issella.

gramashakthi wadasatahanedi janapathigen asana prashna kalin dila?
ayi yako, kanna nathuwa hitiyath awurudu kittu wenakota tawun walayi redi kada walayi ara mokakado wage senaga.
hil walata sentimitarayak withara ithuru wenakam ara kalawam karapu mishranaya bhajanayata danna.

birathanya yatath wijitha palanayen midi nidahasa laba ganimen pasuwa indiyawa dutu athi dawanthama wada warjanaya sapthambar 2da mulu indiyawa purama pathira giya wada warjanaya baw pawasima athishayokthiyak nowe.
apith ahalin pahalin sahayogayak dennam..
guwan sewayen laksha 30kata wada watup ganna gal amda saha parapura
pasugiya wasare hamuwu rogin 280 n rogin 220 k pamana pirimi rogin bawath in bahutharayak samalingika sambandhatha pawathwana padgalayin bawa waidyawaraya pawasiya.

me pilibanda sithamin hithe degidiyawen salithawa sitina wita me waraye pasal niwasanthara ka්rida tharaga pilibanda awadhanaya yomu karamin rawaya puwath pathata lalith gunawardhana wisin lipiyak sapaya thibune pasal lamun miya yamata haki pasal ka්rida arambaena bawa pawasamini.
mema illima sadharanakaranaya karamin diyadawa adawi wana karyalaye niladharinda mema wyayamayata sahaya labadi thibuni.
pera ki aaweshawimak wunoth anith naluwa karanne mokakda kiyana eka ganawath awabodhayak nathiwa yanawa.
ee nisa me aathmayedi ma patan ganna awabodhaya labanna, kal danna epa.
janadhipathiwaranaya kal damime wuwamanawak athamunata thibena bawa penawa
uthure nadarajalatath dakune somasirilatath in wana kisidu yahapathak natha.
gajat wadi nisa pej eka lod wenneth parakku wela.
eda kathanayaka ech.em.smayil mahatha ya.
man hamadema amathaka karala eyath ekka sathutin inna hitha hadagaththa.
rate hata delakshayakage wuwamanawan me ek amathiwarayakuge kamaththa akamaththata wada suwishala nisa ya.

ee wana wita latha botheju, dipthi fonseka, nelum wimalarathna, aruna gunarathna, kamilas perera, sunil horeshas, susil jinapriya, susil gunarathna, gisha munasinha aadin sarasawiye wuha.ma lekhawus eematath pera sita sarasawiyata liyu bawa kimata amathaka wiya.

prayojanawath gaman biman yede.

nadda? (181)  kodunaratiyata hani siduwu roginwa pampeyimadu surakum madhyasthanayen iwathkirima sambandhayen sadharanayak karadena men pradhana amathyawarayagen illa sitinnemi (181)  peraharawalata ali labadimata wishesha eekakayak (180)  daham pasal sisuwa kaha iren paniddi tipar rathayata bili (180)  nawa wasare gruha eekaka samikshana 4k (180)  rajaye sthawaraya idiri desathiye di kiwa yuthuyi (180)  kandukaraye janathawata indiya damilayin yanuwen nam kirima nokala yuthuya ! (179)  al husen kumaru 6da diwayinata ! (179)  richwe rohale sistar saha nars gutibata huwamaruwaka ! (179)  lankawe sasthara kiyapu indiya jathikayan 2k kotu (179)  hirunikage difendarayata laksha 45ka bandumkarayak (178)  kathanayakata marana tharjana (178)  yuda bima jayagaththath hada bima jaya gaththe naha  rejinold kure (178)  em.ke.ee.di.es.gen his wu manthri dhurayata fonseka path karannayi illim (177)  agramathyawarayage prakashaya heladakiyi ! (177)  lowa prathama magi dronaya (177)  sha්rilanipa nila mathaya kiyayi ! (176)  ""pibidemu polonnaruwa"" samarambhaka ulela janapathi pradhanathwayen ada ! (176)  hodama sancharaka gamanantha 10 ta lankawath ! (176)  sisuwiyata ayuthu lingika padam - gura athadanguwe ! (176)  shri lankan guwan samagama kaban wimochanaya awama guwan sewawak lesa dewani sthanayata (176)  shiranthi ada komisamata (176)  sika rogin ayi.di.ech wetha ewanna (176)  wigneshwaran pilibandawa athrupthiyak ! (175)  naththandiye wyaparikayekuta wedi ! (175)  shri lankawe ran padakkam atak dakwa wadiweyi (175)  deshapalana aramunu wenuwen waidya niladharinge sangamaya prakasha sidukaranawa (175)  kolambaa kotas ga්risiye mawathe..

sathwa ayithiwasikam kriyakarin wisin sarkas thula lowa prathama sathwa thahanama lesin hadunwanu labana kriyamargaya boliwiyawa wisin balathmaka kara atha.[19]
